Title: Relates to utilization review agents access to electronic medical records
Summary: Requires certain medical records to be made available when requested by utilization review agents.
LawCode: Amd §§2803, 4902 & 4905, Pub Health L; amd §31.04, Ment Hyg L; amd §§4902 & 4905, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, the mental hygiene law and the insurance law, in relation to utilization review agents access to electronic medical records
